content: last two rounds count as the shoulder - fo leave tail for sewing stuff arms then sew to sides just under the neck cheek blooms - 2mm hook - pink - make 2 1 single_crochet 10 into magic_ring slip_stitch to join 2 slip_stitch into 1st stitch same as join ch2 double_crochet 3 into same ch2 slip_stitch into same slip_stitch 2 - repeat between ** four more times to make a total of five petals sew to cheeks in line with the mouth about eight stitches away from ends of mouth vine - olive green 1 ch10 double_crochet into 3rd st from hook ch2 slip_stitch back into same ch7 - repeat between ** to desired length fo leave a long tail to use for tacking the vine on every couple of inches i did a total of 15 leaves on mine which made it just long enough to start at the toe of one leg across the belly angled over the chest up around the back of the head and over the left ear sew the end to the front of the ear weave in ends sprouts - 3mm hook - pink & brown - make 4 pink petals - 1 ch4 slip_stitch single_crochet slip_stitch ch5 slip_stitch single_crochet slip_stitch - fo this should leave one unworked chain in the middle weave in ends brown stem - 1 ch13 slip_stitch 2 slip_stitch 3rd stitch through the center chain of the first pink bud slip_stitch 3 more then fasten second pink bud with next slip_stitch slip_stitch 5 - do not fo 2 repeat row 1 - fo use tails to sew to the head at the top of the right ear near the base of the mushroom leaf eyebrows - make 2 - lime green - 3mm hook 1 ch8 slip_stitch single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch 2 ch1 working on other side - slip_stitch single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch ch3 slip_stitch 2 slip_stitch back into leaf - fo leave tail for sewing sew leaves over eyes at a slight angle acorn - 3mm hook bottom piece - tan or light brown 1 single_crochet 4 into magic_ring 2 increase single_crochet increase single_crochet 6 3 increase single_crochet around 9 4 increase single_crochet 2 around 12 slip_stitch into next fo weave in end top piece - brown 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 blo - increase single_crochet 3 around 15 slip_stitch into next fo leave tail for sewing stuff bottom lightly use tail to sew the top & bottom together pull tail up through center of the top and tie a couple of knots to create a small stem use remaining tail to sew the acorn onto the left side of the chest
